other_tests.findings: Mild variations in fiber size with ragged red fibers. Five percent of the muscle fibers had decreased cytochrome c oxidase staining.

other_tests.procedure_name: Biochemical analysis of muscle specimen respiratory chain enzymes
other_tests.findings: Deficiencies of complexes III and IV, activities: complex III 104.9 nmol/min/mg (control: 197.2–366.6), complex IV 23.1 nmol/min/mg (control: 144.7–355.8).

other_tests.date: Before treatment and after 1 day and 6 months of pyruvate therapy
other_tests.findings: Before treatment: 4.3 /H9262g/d; after 1 day: improved to 17.2 /H9262g/d; after 6 months: improved to 30.2 /H9262g/d.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Improvement observed only during treatment, decreased to 4.0 /H9262g/d after cessation of oral administration.

other_tests.date: Before treatment and after 2 months and 6 months of pyruvate therapy
other_tests.findings: Before treatment: 33 U/d; after 2 months: decreased to 29 U/d; after 6 months: decreased to 20 U/d.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After cessation of oral administration, levels increased.

other_tests.date: Before treatment and after 2 months and 6 months of therapy
other_tests.findings: Before treatment: 23; after 2 months: remained 23; after 6 months: increased to 25.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Worsened due to progression of muscle weakness.

other_tests.findings: Before treatment: 440 U/L; no change noted with therapy.
